latest.note: Press Alt key to toggle title bar. Update Window now closes. Windows auto-hide in background. Improved with Mac OS X Space.

old.note: New Preset with wrong dimensions fixed. Release Notes added to Update Window. Preferences Window now closes instead of hides.
Launching failure due to wrong settings data structure fixed.
IE8 Windows 7 and iPhone Landscape Skins added. Multi-screen does always showing guides issue fixed.
Multi-screen drag mode fixed. PSP 3000 Black skins added.
Skin resizing issue fixed. New skins added. Adobe Air runtime version shown in About panel.
Double-click and input size right in the title bar.
Custom Skins and Overlay's 1px smaller issue fixed.
Shift Resize features for locked aspect ratio and grid snapping.
Shadow inside ruler removed. High contrast shadow. Ruler texture is transparent. Email link in About Panel removed.
Installation description shortened. Hyperlinks in About Panel set with _blank target.
Apply skins from system tray /dock menu.
Quick Guides and guide color switching by Spacebar.
A bug always showing update-to-date even when an update is available fixed.
Migrated to a Thawte approved code sign.
